Actions.Name: Claw Slam
Actions.Effects: The [name] can spend additional actions on this attack. Every extra action it spends on it gives it bonus damage and +1 boon.

Actions.Name: Water Jet
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a line 5 area effect drawn adjacent to it while in this stance. When the [name] moves, it can reposition this effect, but reduces its size by 1. Characters that move into the area or start their turn there take 2 damage, are shoved 2 and must save or become weakened. Weakened foes fail this save and take 4 damage instead. When the area reaches 0, the stance ends.
